DocAttribute.Name: Identification
Name
DocAttribute.Documentation: File name or document name assigned by owner.

DocAttribute.Name: Description
DocAttribute.Documentation: Description of document and its content.

DocAttribute.Name: Location
Purpose
DocAttribute.Documentation: Purpose for this document.

DocAttribute.Name: IntendedUse
DocAttribute.Documentation: Intended use for this document.

DocAttribute.Name: Scope
DocAttribute.Documentation: Scope for this document.

DocAttribute.Name: Revision
DocAttribute.Documentation: Document revision designation.

DocAttribute.Name: DocumentOwner
DocAttribute.Documentation: Information about the person and/or organization acknowledged as the 'owner' of this document. In some contexts, the document owner determines who has access to or editing right to the document.

DocAttribute.Name: Editors
DocAttribute.Documentation: The persons and/or organizations who have created this document or contributed to it.

DocAttribute.Name: CreationTime
LastRevisionTime
ElectronicFormat
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Describes the media type used in various internet protocols, also referred to as "Content-type", or "MIME-type (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extension), of the document being referenced. It is composed of (at least) two parts, a type and a subtype. > NOTE  The iana (Internet Assigned Numbers Authority) published the media types.
> EXAMPLE  'image/png' denotes an image type of png (Portable Network Graphics) subtype, 'application/pdf' denotes an application specific type of pdf (Portable Document Format) subtype
{ .change-ifc2x4} > IFC4 CHANGE  The data type has been changed from entity data type to _IfcIdentifier_.

DocAttribute.Name: ValidFrom
ValidUntil
Confidentiality
DocAttribute.Documentation: The level of confidentiality of the document.

DocAttribute.Name: Status
DocAttribute.Documentation: The current status of the document. Examples of status values that might be used for a document information status include: - DRAFT - FINAL DRAFT - FINAL - REVISION

DocAttribute.Name: DocumentInfoForObjects
HasDocumentReferences
DocAttribute.Documentation: The document references to which the document applies

DocAttribute.Name: IsPointedTo
DocAttribute.Documentation: An inverse relationship from the IfcDocumentInformationRelationship to the related documents./EPM-HTML>

DocAttribute.Name: IsPointer
DocAttribute.Documentation: An inverse relationship from the IfcDocumentInformationRelationship to the relating document.
